returns._0: Reactive contract's current debt due to unpaid reactive transactions and/or callbacks.

params._contract: Contract address to monitor, or `0` for all contracts.
params.chain_id: EIP155 source chain ID for the event (as a `uint256`), or `0` for all chains.
params.topic_0: Topic 0 to monitor, or `REACTIVE_IGNORE` for all topics.
params.topic_1: Topic 1 to monitor, or `REACTIVE_IGNORE` for all topics.
params.topic_2: Topic 2 to monitor, or `REACTIVE_IGNORE` for all topics.
params.topic_3: Topic 3 to monitor, or `REACTIVE_IGNORE` for all topics.

params._contract: Contract address criterion of the original subscription.
params.chain_id: Chain ID criterion of the original subscription.
params.topic_0: Topic 0 criterion of the original subscription.
params.topic_1: Topic 0 criterion of the original subscription.
params.topic_2: Topic 0 criterion of the original subscription.
params.topic_3: Topic 0 criterion of the original subscription.

debt(address).notice: Allows reactive contracts to check their outstanding debt.

subscribe(uint256,address,uint256,uint25.notice: Subscribes the calling contract to receive events matching the criteria specified.

unsubscribe(uint256,address,uint256,uint.notice: Removes active subscription of the calling contract, matching the criteria specified, if one exists.
